meanings.definition: The manner in which something operates or functions.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the workings of a clock helps you know how it tells time.
meanings.sent2: The workings of a computer involve many small parts working together.
meanings.sent3: I never knew the workings of a toaster could be so fascinating!
meanings.sent4: The workings of a car engine are like a symphony of moving parts.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the inner workings of a watch can be like discovering a tiny world.

meanings.definition: The process or manner of operation or functioning.
meanings.sent1: The workings of a factory determine how efficiently it can produce goods.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the workings of a machine can help you fix it when it breaks.
meanings.sent3: The workings of a vending machine can sometimes seem like magic.
meanings.sent4: The workings of nature are complex and beautiful beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: Studying the workings of the human body can be both fascinating and challenging.

meanings.definition: The inner mechanisms or processes of a system or organization.
meanings.sent1: The workings of a company can be influenced by many factors.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the workings of a government can help you be a more informed citizen.
meanings.sent3: The workings of a school can sometimes feel like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent4: The inner workings of a computer are like a complex puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the workings of a library can reveal the hidden organization behind the shelves.
